requirement.en: If you have 10 or more cards in your Deck and you have "Dice Key Bachika" face-up on your field, shuffle your Deck.

effect.en: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if you sent a Level 7 monster with an effect that requires a die roll to the Graveyard by this effect, inflict 700 damage to your opponent. Then, if you inflicted damage, you can destroy up to 7 cards on the field.
